name: Github Dark Blues (wide)
description:
A full-width (wide-view) dark theme for Github using blue hues, green links and complimentary code-editor colors

ALSO - checkout GitHub Wide Transparent - https://userstyles.org/styles/126131/github-wide-transparent
additional_info: Release Notes: 28-Feb-2017 - Backgrounds of new elements. 04-Oct-2016 - Updated user profile and PR screens. 21-Sep-2016 - App authorization styles. 26-Jul-2016 - Repository options, forking and notifications. 20-Jul-2016 - General updates for seldom used screens (New Repo etc.). 21-Jun-2016 - Updated to new GitHub box model style names. 24-May-2016 - Updated SVG/Octicons etc. 16-May-2016 - Fixed repo activity graphs. User Profile Styles. 29-Mar-2016 - Added full-width mode. General updates. 16-Mar-2016 - Updated for newly implemented GitHub styles. 29-Jan-2016 - Updated guides.github.com example panels, and Help pages. 28-Jan-2016 - Updated GitHub Status pages to better highlight graphs and alerts.

discussions.name: Great theme but GREEN file/folder paths?
